com.mygdx.game

Class RandomEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.RandomEvent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Earthquake, Malfunction

extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    Assessment 4 An executable version of the game can be found at: http://gandhi-inc.me/downloads/assessment4.jar Our website is: www.gandhi-inc.me

    Gandhi-Inc.

    • Method Detail

      • eventEffect

        public abstract void eventEffect(boolean doOrUndo)
        Abstract method which implements the back-end effects of a random event. Required to be implemented by all sub-classes
        Parameters:
        doOrUndo: - boolean determining whether to cause the event effect, or reverse it. True = Cause, False = Reverse.

      • eventMessage

        public abstract java.lang.String eventMessage(boolean doOrUndo)
        Abstract method which generates a string to display in the random event message overlay during gameplay. Required to be implemented by all sub-classes.
        Parameters:
        doOrUndo: - boolean determining whether to cause the event effect, or reverse it. True = Cause, False = Reverse.

      • getEventCooldown

        protected int getEventCooldown()
        Method which returns the value that the duration of an event must decrement to in order for it to be removed from the game. When this value is reached, a new event of the same type is allowed to occur. Method is inherited by sub-classes.

      • eventHappen

        public void eventHappen(boolean doOrUndo)
        Method which calls eventEffect() and eventMessage() in sequence, and displays the message in the GUI. This method should be used to trigger a random event, rather than calling eventEffect() or eventMessage() directly.
        Parameters:
        doOrUndo: - boolean determining whether to cause the event effect, or reverse it. True = Cause, False = Reverse.

      • getDuration

        protected int getDuration()
        Method which gets the duration remaining of the current random event.

      • decDuration

        protected void decDuration()
        Method which decrements the duration of the event by 1.
